settings.section_html:
We are two dreamers
that share a common dream

We want to nourish your mind and body so that you can:

  • Surpass yourself personally and professionally!
  • Find the courage to pursue your dreams.
  • Create new opportunities, with enthusiasm.

custom_css: .subheading {text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1px; font-size: 12px; margin-bottom: 7px; font-weight: 800; color: #d19b71;}

settings.subtitle: Our MISSION
settings.title: Add some "joie de vivre" to your everyday
settings.text:
We know you have a lot on your plate‚Äîyou‚Äôre busy with the kids and work, making sure that all your loved one's are taken care of.

But what about your energy, your dreams and your health?

Teangle was created to give you the positive energy you need to prioritize your well-being.

custom_css: .subheading {text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1px; font-size: 12px; margin-bottom: 7px; font-weight: 800; color: #d19b71;}

settings.subtitle: What we do
settings.title: We make better matcha
settings.text:
Having witnessed the life changing effects on drinking matcha on himself. Our founder knew it could help a ton of other people. But there were two obstacles in the way before Matcha could achieve acceptance:

1- Few companies specialize in all natural matcha.

2 - There are a lot of mainstream matcha tea companies that distribute substandard product.

custom_css: .subheading {text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1px; font-size: 12px; margin-bottom: 7px; font-weight: 800; color: #d19b71;}

settings.subtitle: How it started
settings.title: Meet Phil üëãüèª
settings.text:
During his self-help journey, our founder Philippe discovered matcha and fell in love with how it made him feel -¬†happier¬†&¬†more productive!

He tried convincing his friends and family to start drinking matcha. But he failed...

They were put off by its taste and preparation.

Determined to make them change their minds, Philippe knew he had to find a way to make drinking matcha easy and delicious - for everyone to enjoy!

That‚Äôs when Teangle was born.

custom_css: .subheading {text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1px; font-size: 12px; margin-bottom: 7px; font-weight: 800; color: #d19b71;}

settings.subtitle: Our why
settings.title: Why women?
settings.text:
Witnessing my mother's selflessness and how she dedicated herself to others, often neglecting her own well-being, left a lasting impression on me.

It made me realize that countless women embody this same altruistic nature.

They constantly give, give, and give, often placing their own needs, desires, and dreams on the back burner.

At Teangle, we are driven by the belief that every woman deserves the opportunity to flourish and thrive.

settings.subtitle: SISTER AND PARTNER
settings.title: Jade
settings.text:
A big sister is never ‚Äòfar‚Äô away.¬†

I have been working with Philippe behind the scenes from the very beginning. Back when Teangle was just an idea ! I remember we‚Äôd spend hours brainstorming names, slogans, working on the logo‚Ä¶ daydreaming about our vision for Teangle !¬†¬†

For the first time in a long time, Philippe was excited and passionate about something. This filled my heart with so much joy. & I wanted to help in any way I could.

At the time, I was a marine biologist living it up in the land of down under (Australia) with a bucket full of plans : next up New Zealand, working with sharks in the Bahamas... I had it all laid out (well sort of) with NO intention of returning home anytime soon.¬†

That‚Äôs the thing about life isn‚Äôt it, plans OFTEN change...

So through a series of events, I found myself standing outside my mom's door with my suitcase : ‚ÄòSURPRISE‚Äô I screamed ! Little did I know, I was the one who was about to embark on an adventure full of surprises.¬†

Amongst other things, moving back home meant spending more time with Philippe AND getting more intimate with Teangle.¬†In my free time, I'd help out wherever I could ; anything from copywriting, to packing orders, managing Teangles social media accounts...

One day it dawned on me that every day I was excited to get home to write blogs about Matcha, chat with the Teangle family, envision the design of the website...¬†
I realized that day that I knew what I wanted. I wanted to help people fall in love with a ritual that would change their lives!

Ever since I was a little girl, I've always said that my mission in life is to be a sun for everyone around me, to spread my light and brighten their day ! Teangle is my vehicle to do exactly that, it enables me to spread positive vibes on a MASSIVE scale and not just to people around me - because friends, we‚Äôre going worldwide !¬†

Philippe often says that Teangle is the embodiment of ME - a positive cheerleader spreading good vibes. And it really is an extension of myself.

Today, I work alongside my brother running Teangle, I'm his trusty sidekick, his right hand and above all else his sister !¬†

Together, we‚Äôre building THE biggest and best family in the world - the Teangle family, a group of like minded individuals with a thirst for life who are all about using their energy to spread the feeling of joie de vivre in all those around them.

& all of this, one cup of Matcha at a time.
